website_summaries.verdict: A good tasting, smooth peanut butter that delivers a protein punch.
cons: This product contains extra sugar and GMO products

customer_reviews.title: Skippy Peanut Butter Is Good!
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy Jif, because that was the kind my Mom and Dad bought, but I like Hormel products (my nephew's wife works for them) so I purchased Skippy to try. I was a little bit worried since my son was coming home for Thanksgiving weekend and he eats a peanut butter sandwich almost every night as a snack. I'm happy to write that he has purchased Skippy before (always on sale) and the taste is very good. Spreads easily and didn't seem oily. Now I have another option we all like.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: What to say about peanut butter? It’s good. It spreads nicely. It sticks to the roof of your mouth. My dog likes it. It’s good with the apples, it’s good with jelly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: You cannot find it in Walmart anymore
customer_reviews.text: I have used every product out there throughout my lifetime and for the last 10 years we only use this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Becker

customer_reviews.title: Best Regular Peanut Butter
customer_reviews.text: This is my family’s favorite peanut butter. I don’t eat much, as I try to stay away from sugar, but the very favorite of mine—since childhood!
customer_reviews.author: goldybark7

customer_reviews.title: Puppy essentials
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is obsessed with this peanut butter I’m so happy it’s safe
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: but it was very good. I use it mostly for making my dog's ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought the jar was larger, but it was very good. I use it mostly for making my dog's natural treats. He and his friend LOVE the treats.
customer_reviews.author: palfreda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best Peanut Butter Ever... It would REALLLLLY be great if they didn't use Sugar Beets-- which contain GMOs.
customer_reviews.author: Meats

customer_reviews.title: Our number one choice in peanut butter.
customer_reviews.text: Skippy is always the best peanut butter. Our family ‘s favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Jlynne

customer_reviews.title: AS EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: What can be said of SKIPPY Peanut Butter besides, YUM? Well, YUMMY, is all. SKIPPY is reliable delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Marino

customer_reviews.title: It's gone! My daughter grabs a spoonful before bed ...
customer_reviews.text: It's gone! My daughter grabs a spoonful before bed when she's feeling peckish. It gives her protien to hold her over til breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: PNB Yum
customer_reviews.text: Wish I didn't like Skippy Peanut Butter so well. ;/
customer_reviews.author: BosMA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Skippy is always in my pantry. It is delicious and smooth. Or as the label says "CREAMY".
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Broken when arrived- heavy things & light things shipped in box together!
customer_reviews.text: Broken when arrived- heavy things & light things thrown in a box together.
customer_reviews.author: reviewdt

customer_reviews.title: Suomi
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy my peanut butter daily. I was raised on Skippy and I truly enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Suomi Amodeo

customer_reviews.title: Two paws up
customer_reviews.text: Peanut butter is a personal preference, so my saying it's great isn't going to guarantee you'll think it's great, but I use the creamy to give pills to my dog and she gives it 2 paws up.
customer_reviews.author: David Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Classic!
customer_reviews.text: Skippy Creamy Peanut Butter is a classic in our home! Creamy and super yummy!!
customer_reviews.author: sonic

customer_reviews.title: creamy smooth
customer_reviews.text: It is really good but the reduced fat tastes better.
customer_reviews.author: Loanmanager

product_meta.title: SKIPPY Peanut Butter, Creamy, 28 Ounce
product_meta.description:
SKIPPY Peanut Butter has been spreading tasty fun to every household since 1933. With 4 simple ingredients, 7 grams of protein, and no artificial flavors or colors, this creamy peanut butter is perfect for any snack or part of any meal. From a delicious piece of peanut butter toast, to apples or celery with a peanut buttery dip, the different ways to enjoy SKIPPY are endless. So when you’re craving an easy, satisfying snack, there’s only one thing to do. Be Smooth Like SKIPPY.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :5.5 x 3.5 x 3.5 inches; 1.85 Pounds
 * Item model number :10856
 * Date First Available :May 19, 2016
 * Manufacturer :Hormel
 * ASIN :B01FW4Z094

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars145 ratings SKIPPY Peanut Butter has been spreading tasty fun to every household since 1933. With 4 simple ingredients, 7 grams of protein, and no artificial flavors or colors, this creamy peanut butter is perfect for any snack or part of any meal. From a delicious piece of peanut butter toast, to apples or celery with a peanut buttery dip, the different ways to enjoy SKIPPY are endless. So when you’re craving an easy, satisfying snack, there’s only one thing to do. Be Smooth Like SKIPPY.
feature_bullets: Creamy peanut butter made with real roasted peanuts
No separation; no oily mess; spreads easily
Tree nut free peanut butter (does contain peanuts)
